nodes.text: The alien Larry lived in a tribe on the Forest Moon of Endor. When Larry was a child, he ran away from his home, saying that it would take "a million munyips to drag him back." Larry returned several years later, by 3 ABY, and he discovered that everyone in the community had relocated without him.

The community was mentioned in "Home is Where the Shrieks Are," the third episode in the second season of the animated television series Ewoks. The episode was written by Bob Carrau, and it premiered on September 20, 1986.
